data.description:
This playbook was created to show how to retrieve Alerts from Recorded Future for processing within the Phantom platform. A typical usecase is handling of leaked credentials.

The playbook has been updated to work in conjunction with Recorded Future App for Phantom v2.0.

cells.block_code:
def on_start(container):
    phantom.debug('on_start() called')
    
    # call 'alert_data_lookup_3' block
    alert_data_lookup_3(container=container)

    return
cells.title: START

cells.block_code:

cells.title: END

cells.block_code:
def format_1(action=None, success=None, container=None, results=None, handle=None, filtered_artifacts=None, filtered_results=None):
    phantom.debug('format_1() called')
    
    template = """Recorded Future is alerting on probable leaked credentials.

Alert: 
  {0}

More information: 
  {1}

Leaked Email adresses:
  {2}

test: {5}

{4}

{3}"""

    # parameter list for template variable replacement
    parameters = [
        "alert_data_lookup_3:action_result.data.*.alerts.*.alert.content.title",
        "alert_data_lookup_3:action_result.data.*.alerts.*.alert.content.url",
        "alert_data_lookup_3:action_result.data.*.alerts.*.alert.entities.EmailAddress",
        "alert_data_lookup_3:action_result.data.*.alerts.*.alert.alertTitle",
        "alert_data_lookup_3:action_result.data.*.alerts.*.alert.content.counts.references",
        "alert_data_lookup_3:action_result.data.*.alerts.*.alert.entities.EmailAddress",
    ]

    phantom.format(container=container, template=template, parameters=parameters, name="format_1")

    send_email_1(container=container)

    return
cells.name: format
cells.title: format

rule_id.description: Alert Rule ID to look up alert data for

timeframe.description: Time range for when rules were triggered

cells.name: alert data lookup
cells.title: Investigate

attachments.description: Vault IDs of files to attach
attachments.verbose: Each file that is required to be attached, needs to be in the vault. Multiple file vault ids can be specified as comma separated.

bcc.description: List of recipients email addresses to include on bcc line

cc.description: List of recipients email addresses to include on cc line

cells.block_code:
def send_email_1(action=None, success=None, container=None, results=None, handle=None, filtered_artifacts=None, filtered_results=None):
    phantom.debug('send_email_1() called')
    
    #phantom.debug('Action: {0} {1}'.format(action['name'], ('SUCCEEDED' if success else 'FAILED')))
    
    # collect data for 'send_email_1' call
    formatted_data_1 = phantom.get_format_data(name='format_1')

    parameters = []
    
    # build parameters list for 'send_email_1' call
    parameters.append({
        'body': formatted_data_1,
        'from': "phantom@example.com",
        'attachments': "",
        'to': "",
        'cc': "",
        'bcc': "",
        'headers': "",
        'subject': "Recorded Future Alert: Leaked Credentials",
    })

    phantom.act("send email", parameters=parameters, assets=['smtp'], name="send_email_1")

    return
cells.name: send email
cells.title: Generic
